content: if you re looking for a fun fast and adorably squishy sea creature to crochet you re going to love this crochet squid pattern this little guy is the perfect project whether you re making a full ocean crew or just want a cute desk buddy **materials** ▢any worsted weight yarn roughly a quarter skein or so ▢4 5 mm hook ▢polyfill ▢12 mm safety eyes ▢tapestry needle **abbreviations us terms ** chains - chain single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet increase - increase slip_stitch - slip_stitch
